GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
media: ti-vpe: cal: Fix a NULL pointer dereference in cal_ctx_v4l2_init_formats()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit aa613ac270292e102503e9767882e39200efe608, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 7168155002cf7aadbfaa14a28f037c880a214764. For more details please see the references link.
